techmeme.title: Sources detail Reliance Retail's overhaul plans in its efforts for a $125B IPO valuation, as India's largest retailer renews focus on scaling up quick commerce (Bloomberg)
In a policy paper, Eric Schmidt, Scale AI's Alexandr Wang, and Center for AI Safety's Dan Hendrycks argue the US should not pursue a "Manhattan Project" for AGI (Maxwell Zeff/TechCrunch)
A TollBit analysis of 160 websites on its content licensing platform finds AI search engines drive 96% less referral traffic than traditional Google Search (Forbes)
India's Income Tax Bill 2025 grants income tax officers the legal authority to access taxpayers' email and social media accounts if they suspect tax evasion (Ira Alok Puranik/The Economic Times)
Alibaba releases QwQ-32B, an open-source reasoning model, on Hugging Face and ModelScope, claiming performance similar to DeepSeek-R1 with lower compute needs (Carl Franzen/VentureBeat)
